column4: mandrake takes longer to do an update check... says update cache downloading sources and packages. Is this something new?
why would you ask that in #ubuntu?
I ment maverick not mandrake, oops
ok, fair mistake. Not sure why it takes longer, but I suspect it will change based on network traffic. I have only tested 10.10 for a few hours so I can't say for sure if they changed it.
